SearchIndex Manager

This page allows you to update or rebuild the index used by the full-text search. This is generally not needed as the index builds and updates itself as users browse your wiki. However if you just upgraded, added or removed a lot of files it may be a good idea to clean up the index.

Rebuilding the index can take a long time. You should leave the page open until the indexing has finished.

NOTE: This manager needs a recent browser as it makes use of modern JavaScript to carry out multiple tasks in the background (using AJAX).
